documents.document: @WhiplashUnited I noticed earlier today.
The immature child in me wants to point out this is my 6969th tweet. https://t.co/xObK7a8PEb
@RedwingRider13 they're gonna lose someone in expansion. Plus I have wanted Trouba forever. My dream will not die

@TheSportsJim or actually Patrick Eaves

@waratahjesus @Aussie7s that's awesome.
@nbauer10 I hope your day is can bottle too.
@AnthonyRescan if only it were that easy

@Dez_Walker another banner day for humanity.

@JohnRBielski @StephaliciousD ps. bring Wawa & Jims. Thanks.

@WingsPride It was a much more generalised comment
@WingsPride Of course, why have tazers when you can use hand guns instead.
@WingsPride So are they gonna tazer you as well?
@WingsPride I'm assuming they sprayed you in your eyes. Should have requested they just spray your feet.
